Instructions

Thank you for your interest in our study. We are conducting an academic study about what things are most important to you in life. It is not being conducted for commercial purposes and your responses will not be sold.

This is a survey about your opinions so there are no right or wrong answers. But it is important to us that you think carefully about your opinions and answer as honestly as you can. If we find evidence that you are not giving careful answers we will not invite you to participate in future surveys.

Here are the steps to participate

  1. Accept this HIT.
  2. Click on the survey link.
  3. Make sure to leave this window open as you complete the survey.
  4. Complete the survey. The survey will take approximately 30 minutes.
  5. At the end of the survey, you will obtain a survey code to verify and accept your work.
  6. Return to this page and paste the survey code in the box below.
